sentences.sContent: These blackboards, chalked with figures, hung in a neat row all along the latticed balustrade of the gallery.
sentences.sContent_eng: These blackboards, chalked with figures, hung in a neat row all along the latticed balustrade of the gallery.
sentences.sCn: 这些黑地白粉字的“牌子”站得整整齐齐，挂满了楼上那一带口字式的栏杆。

sentences.sContent: This painting has been reproduced over and over again, and almost everyone is familiar with the cherubs leaning on the balustrade .
sentences.sContent_eng: This painting has been reproduced over and over again, and almost everyone is familiar with the cherubs leaning on the balustrade .
sentences.sCn: 这一幅画一再地已经被再生，而且几乎每个人在栏杆上熟悉天童倾斜。

trans.tranOther: a row of wooden, stone, or metal posts that stop someone falling from a bridge or  balcony
